about_the_game:
How to play ? 🧠


Challenge your vocabulary! Starting from the last letter of the previous word, make a new word using the provided letters. Try to create the longest word chain ever!

Relax Mode 😌


No timer. Just relax and enjoy. Take a nap. Perfect for a quick mental break or a long, relaxing session.

Speed Mode ⚡


Test your speed and skill under pressure!

Multilingual Support 🌐


Play in English, French, or Spanish! Easily switch between languages in the settings and see how your skills stack up in each language. Perfect for language learners or polyglots looking for a challenge.

Global Leaderboards 🌍


Compete against players worldwide! Climb the leaderboards in both Relax and Speed modes and see where you stand in each language. Can you become the top player in English, French, or Spanish?

Constantly Evolving 🚀


We’re committed to making the game even better! Expect monthly updates with new features, improvements, and content. Join our community to share your feedback and be a part of the game’s development journey!

Join Our Community! 💬
